name: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh salmon fillet seasoned and grilled to perfection, served with steamed vegetables and lemon herb sauce.

name: Chicken Alfredo
description: Tender chicken breast slices served over fettuccine pasta with creamy Alfredo sauce.

name: Vegetable Stir-Fry
description: Assorted vegetables stir-fried in a savory sauce, served with steamed rice.

name: Beef Tenderloin Steak
description: Juicy beef tenderloin steak cooked to your preferred temperature, served with garlic mashed potatoes and grilled asparagus.

name: Penne Primavera
description: Penne pasta tossed with a medley of fresh vegetables and a light garlic sauce.
